characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: A Revenant Titan can Fall Back in the Movement phase and still shoot and/or charge during its turn. When a Revenant Titan Falls Back, it can even move over enemy INFANTRY models, though at the end of its move it must be more than 1" from all enemy units. In addition, a Revenant Titan can move and fire Heavy weapons without suffering the penalty to its hit rolls. Finally, a Revenant Titan only gains a bonus to its save in cover if at least half of the model is obscured from the bearer.
